articles.author: Neil Armstrong
articles.title: Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy: The true story behind the mysterious and tragic US icon - BBC
articles.description: Alongside husband JFK Jr, Carolyn Bessette-Kennedy was one half of America's great 1990s golden couple, before their untimely deaths. A new drama is set to explore her struggles.
articles.content: She is also the subject of a new nine-part drama from Ryan Murphy, creator of American Horror Story and American Crime Story. The first season of his latest franchise Love Story is about the courtshi… [+2193 chars]
